tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Even by your own admission, this company has been releasing vast quantities of God knows what into the air. You have been told about this for years and did nothing. So it's understandable that people are angry you've still done nothing. Close it immediately and start prosecuting
@tinaonions @Hyosube @EnvAgencyMids Hi, the Sileby Brook is covered by the same bylaws and therefore no coarse fishing should be undertaken from 15th March until the 16th June.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids This is the reality of living in Newcastle under Lyme. You cannot allow this to continue #stopthestink #capitoff. https://t.co/OrnSaOvz8I

@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @DaveJonesNuL  The eve of the extraordinary meeting and it was one of the worst nights ever. @RedIndustries2 don't care about us locals. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids SHUT THEM DOWN! #stopthestink #capitoff

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
As part of our ongoing regulation of the @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry landfill site in #Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme we have carried out an audit and issued the company with a Compliance Assessment Report.

Read more üëâ https://t.co/o558iAVicn https://t.co/gyKH2icf6z
Our Fisheries Enforcement Officers are out and about! They're carrying out #CloseSeason patrols on the #RiverTame in #Kingsbury & #LeaMarston to help protect #fish stocks https://t.co/ZWog2mrqiP

Walleys Landfill stinks to high heaven tonight!On the eve/morning of the emergency @NewsNBC meeting. Do Red Industries even care? They do what they want!  it‚Äôs the latest addition to #stinkfest line up - no permit,no health, no future @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/rJV9Q1TVIo

The coarse fishing season is closed on rivers and drains until June 16th. Our Fisheries Enforcement Team are out undertaking patrols to ensure no anglers are fishing illegally. @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/qwb6odoBXw

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Another sleepless night. headaches that won't go away. Shut them down!

@maricaoneill @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 6th night in a row for us, no sleep, can't breathe, heaving with stench, headache by morning & no escape. I've asked where nearest clean air is but Env Agency don't answer questions üò°üò°

More stunning work! Graham Brownhill writes:

Another 15 bags from in and around the Fairywell Brook today. Mainly from Andrew Morris Snr. Knutsford Martin came along to give a helping hand.

March total 826
Annual 3,850

@MccFionaW @MCCWythenshawe @Biffa @EnvAgency @MikeKaneMP https://t.co/vmLm0rTnbQ

tweets.text:
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC The answer and fix is complex:

Dig it all out and incinerate whatever they buried in that pit! Otherwise whatever is there will continue creating noxious gases. It should NEVER have been turned to a landfill site given proximity to housing. Council equally to blame!
@Steeveeh @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA the whole of the town centre stank like the living dead.

Works are progressing well on Phase 2 of the #Carlisle Flood Risk Management Scheme. 

Brickwork cladding has been completed and this week coping stones are being laid near Hardwicke Circus. 

For more on this scheme got to ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/gxCTOEbsAK https://t.co/quJRXzuTER

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Thanks so much. I'll print it out and make a mask when I'm woken by the stench at 2am with crying baby. Top notch work @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA .. cap the n/mind stop the stink... Reform the EA for humans!

@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 Not good enough. The gases haven‚Äôt just appeared. This has been an ongoing breach for YEARS. EA you have failed those you are supposed to protect. I‚Äôm going to be lobbying my MP to convene a public inquiry. The lack of action is appalling

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 There are thousands of people on your patch with foul-smelling and potentially dangerous landfill gas inside their homes every night. It would be good if you could tell us when this will stop, and what you‚Äôre going to do if it doesn‚Äôt.
@CBlighty @MariaHerlihyEA @RiverThames @EnvAgencySE @johncurtinEA @wifo_ea @EmmaHowardBoyd @MarkHill03 @MoretonBack1 Not to mention Sarah at Godstow.

@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @RedIndustries2 don‚Äôt care about regulations they have to adhere to. All they care about is money and causing so much grief to the local residents. Enough is enough. CLOSE THE SITE DOWN

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Last night was horrific. Hundreds of people affected. People are scared, stuffing towels under doors in their homes, the smell getting into operating theatres, people considering driving miles to sleep in their cars. For Gods Sake ! @BBC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids Exactly how bad is a CCS2? How long were the wells disconnected for? What were the fumes we were all breathing in while they were disconnected? We need answers, people are scared. #stopthestink #capitoff

@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 A resident - This is just crazy again tonight. Off Pilkington Av & I‚Äôve reported it 3 times today already. It f*****g stinks & it‚Äôs in my home üò° No sleep last night & this one is heading the same way. Just someone for Christ sake help us üôè @StinkStopthe üò¢

tweets.text: üö® @EnvAgencyMids say a ‚Äòsignificant breach‚Äô has taken place at Walleys Quarry landfillüëá and that it was ‚Äònot acceptable‚Äô. It‚Äôs time the EA ordered it to be close down and capped off. Enough is enough. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Gu9Ziz12vU
@annjsmall @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe Yup, I'm counting down the days until I can finish my degree and leave this town. It's absolutely disgusting!
@MattBuckEA @Hyosube @EnvAgencyMids What restrictions are there on fishing on Sileby Brook? Sileby Brook is a Tributary of the River Soar in Leicestershire?

@LDN_environment @LondonSDC Financing @LondonSDC event - a Greener Fairer London - great line up with @Mabeytweet @e3g; @NVJRobins1; @Jamesogradycam;  @RhianMariThomas @GFI_green; @PhilipGlanville @mayorofhackney; @pete_daw @LDN_environment and Andrew Sissons @EnvAgency - 10am start #GreenFinanceLondon

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Amazing these are only now being highlighted, it‚Äôs almost as if there wasn‚Äôt a problem until a government agency was being put under pressure by the local community, media and an MP?

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe This should not even be a discussion now. We are being severely impacted now. Woke up last night at 2am and could not sleep. Over a mile away and it is beyond ridiculous levels of odour. Is this a police matter now? Being forced out of our homes. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA I am absolutely fuming about this. HOW MUCH MORE DO WE HAVE TO TAKE? ARE WE BEING POISONED? I have children here. @SimonTagg this has to be dealt with as a criminal matter surely.

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe That‚Äôs it?! Seriously?! This after every protestation that they are compliant with every aspect of the running of the site. What else is happening and yet not discovered and how can the EA keep ignoring this? Seriously losing hope here üòû

urls.title: Innovative funding to restore nature
urls.description: Watch our webinar to learn about the challenges and opportunities of innovative finance models for restoring nature from Devon Wildlife Trust, Moors for the Future, National Farmers Union, The Rivers Trust and Triodos Bank.

tweets.text: With @DefraGovUK & @EnvAgency, @EsmeeFairbairn supported 4 pilot projects developing new financing models for conservation & restoration. A webinar to hear more about how private philanthropy can help lever in the scale of funds needed for conservation: https://t.co/PNYEgm7qOI

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 For a CCS Category 2 will the operator now be prosecuted? @ClareDinnisEA isn‚Äôt CCS Cat 2 associated with a significant impact on human health,quality of life or the environment?Is it time for @PHE_uk to act? It‚Äôs not just the stink now #outofcontrol #stopthestink  @StinkStopthe

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe Have Public Health England been informed? You must notify them of incidents with a CCS Category 1 or 2 impact where there is likely to be public concern about the health effects! The updated doctors notes, the reports to PHE the Health concerns grow #stopthestink @StinkStopthe
